page.title: 06SUNNYDALE (Continued)
page.content: There is a large hole in the hillside where the water wheel was,and on the wall are friction marks where the spindle of the wheel has rubbed against it. The wheel has been taken away. There are the foundations of a small row of houses.A very small village was formed around the mill for the workers. There is a small housing estate, and the houses are very spacious and are well designed.The estate is called Sunnydale Park. The mill is not as big as modern factories are today,and has a nice setting.There are still under ground tunnels where the water used to run down and supply the water wheel with power to work the machinery.
